details.title: Effects of Random Implementation Errors in Matched Filters for Binary Phase Code Pulse Signals
details.abstract: The effects of implementation errors in tapped delay line filters on the peak-to-sidelobe ratio and the signal-to-noise ratio of binary PSK pulse compression codes are considered. As error model the delay elements and weighting factors of such filters are assumed to have an error distribution with known mean and variance.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Aerospace and Electronic Systems
